name: Slime Dungeon (itch) (Kolinc)
description:
Made for VimJam!

You're a slime, who wants to leave the dungeon.

You can control him with the 'WASD' or the cursors.

The slime can shoot slime balls with the left mouse button, if it have one or two.

Be carefull, if you shoot a slime ball, with another, one will disapear!

You'll start at the dungeon door, and you need to get back to it, after you found the key somewhere in the dungeon.
